T04bsa035_u:4: iha yaḥ svabhāvato mahākaruṇāprajñāvān mahāyānagotrīyaḥ, yaśca pūrvajanmasu mahāyānabhāvukaḥ puruṣaḥ saṃsārasunirviṇṇacittaḥ maraṇānusmṛtikaśca samastabāhyādhyātmika-vastusvalpābhiniveśaḥ,
T04bsa035_u:5: 'ekasatkalyāṇamitrata ekāviparyastamārgaśravaṇe kiṃ na syāt? ahamekaṃ santaṃ anveṣyāmi' - evaṃ cintayan saḥ kalyāṇamitrānurupaṃ gurumanviṣya anyatra nirdiṣṭavat triśaraṇagamanaviśiṣṭaḥ, anantagatīḥ viṣayīkṛtya,
T04bsa035_u:8: tataḥ śvaśvapacadāsasaṃjñakasya māyāśāṭhyarahitasya tasya bodhisattvasya saṃbhāramārgīyatvād
T04bsa035_u:10: evaṃ tena cittena bhojanamātrājñānam, indriyadvārasaṃvaraṇam, aṇumātre
T04bsa035_u:12: tataḥ śvāsapraśvāsamapi parārtham abhilaṣitukāmaḥ saḥ pañcamaprahara utthāya,
T04bsa035_u:15: triratnapratimāsamakṣaṃ sulipya sugandhapuṣpaprakaraṃ suvikīrya tadagrato bhūmau jānunī saṃsthāpya,
T04bsa035_u:16: daśadiglokadhāta-samastabuddha-samastadharmamahāyānasaṃghasamakṣaṃ ca asaṃkhyānirvācyakāyavyūhān nirmāya teṣāñcaikaikam caraṇayoḥ supraṇamet /
T04bsa035_u:18: tataḥ pratikāyaṃ anirvacanīyamukhāni pratimukhaṃ cānirvacanīyajihvā nirmāya, svaparapāpān aśeṣān diśet /
T04bsa035_u:20: aciram abhisambodhiprāptān buddhān bhagavato dharmacakrapravartanāya adhyeṣayet /
T04bsa035_u:21: ye dharmacakraṃ pravartya āyuḥ saṃskārān parijihīrṣante, (tān) āsaṃsāram aparinirvāṇāya prārthayeta /
T04bsa035_u:23: yathā sūtre āgatāni tathā pratyaṅgapadāni savistaraṃ paṭhet /
T04bsa035_u:24: tataḥ saptapūjānantaraṃ sarvasattvān avalambya triśaraṇagamanapadāni triḥ paṭhet /
T04bsa035_u:25: tataḥ bodhicittamutpādayet, yathā vidhau prāpyate tathā ca kuryāt
T04bsa035_u:27: buddhaṃ ca dharmañca gaṇottamaṃ ca yāvaddhi bodhiṃ śaraṇaṃ gato 'smi /
T04bsa035_u:28: dānādi-kṛtyaiśca kṛtairmayaibhiḥ buddho bhaveyaṃ jagato hitāya // 2 // iti triḥ paṭhet /
T04bsa035_u:29: tataḥ svakāyārpaṇaṃ, tataḥ mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ dharmanaye mahārathināṃ ca mārge
T04bsa035_u:38: ākāśopamānutpādataḥ pratītyasamutpādabalena nānābhāseyamavasthitiḥ ayam' aho! āścaryam' iti vicintya aṣṭamāyopamarupeṇa jānīyāt /
T04bsa035_u:39: tato mahākaruṇacittena samastādṛśyasattvebhyo dharmadeśanārtha yathābodhi mahāyāna-sūtrapāṭhaṃ kuryāt /
T04bsa035_u:41: bhojanāvasare- 'ṣaṭtriṃśadaśuciparipūrṇena asāreṇa nāśaparyavasitena kāyenānena tadbuddhadharmakāya-sāramanveṣayāmi' iti vicintya na
T04bsa035_u:55: tataḥ pūrvāhṇayāmeṣvapi pañcamaprahare yathoktavat sarvaṃ kāryam /
T04bsa035_u:56: madhyāhne sandhyāyāṃ rātreḥ prathame madhye ca yāme sarvathā yathoktāḥ sarve vidhayaḥ pūrayitavyāḥ
T04bsa035_u:64: evaṃ teṣāṃ ṣaḍyāmānām aṣṭādaśadhā vibhāge kṛte sati catuḥpañcāśatkṣaṇā bhaviṣyanti /
T04bsa035_u:67: śreṣṭhaiḥ samākhyātatamaṃ sumārga bodhiprabhādyaiḥ kalitaśca śiṣyaiḥ /
T04bsa035_u:68: gattvā mahāyānakulābhijātaiḥ prāpyaṃ padaṃ tad dvipadendrakasya // 4 //
T04bsa035_u:72: tenaiva paṇḍitena lokacakṣuṣā ca jayaśīlena anūditā //
